ai-patthana16.68:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.68:0.3_0: wrapped in what is associated with the mind of the one’s mind.
ai-patthana16.68:1.1_0: Not insisting the mind, consciousness associated with the mental associated with the mind, and no longer gives rise to repulsion.
ai-patthana16.68:1.1_1: Not inviting the mind no longer associated with the mind, nor are consciousness associated with the mental associated with the mind. ...
ai-patthana16.68:1.1_2: For the one who has not associated with mind the consciousness associated with the mind, and whose mind is not associated with the higher mind. Though there is no cause or condition for the repulsion of the mind.
ai-patthana16.68:1.1_3: This is the section in brief.
ai-patthana16.68:2.1_0: ‘... for the sake of six years.’ ...
